segment.source: Settings reference Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)
segment.target: Settings reference Windows Store for Business (Windows 10)

segment.source: The Windows Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.
segment.target: The Windows Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.

segment.source: Settings reference: Windows Store for Business
segment.target: Settings reference: Windows Store for Business

segment.source: Applies to
segment.target: Applies to

segment.source: Windows 10
segment.target: Windows 10

segment.source: Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: The Windows Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.
segment.target: The Windows Store for Business has a group of settings that admins use to manage the store.

segment.source: Setting
segment.target: Setting

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Account information
segment.target: Account information

segment.source: Manage organization and payment option information.
segment.target: Manage organization and payment option information.

segment.source: For more information, see Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: For more information, see Manage settings for the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Configure whether or not to make offline-licensed apps available in the Store for Business.
segment.target: Configure whether or not to make offline-licensed apps available in the Store for Business.

segment.source: For more information, see Distribute offline apps.
segment.target: For more information, see Distribute offline apps.

segment.source: Device Guard signing
segment.target: Device Guard signing

segment.source: Use the Device Guard signing portal to add unsigned apps to a code integrity policy, or to sign code integrity policies.
segment.target: Use the Device Guard signing portal to add unsigned apps to a code integrity policy, or to sign code integrity policies.

segment.source: For more information, see Device Guard signing portal.
segment.target: For more information, see Device Guard signing portal.

segment.source: LOB publishers
segment.target: LOB publishers

segment.source: Invite devs to become LOB publishers for your organization.
segment.target: Invite devs to become LOB publishers for your organization.

segment.source: Existing LOB publishers are listed on the page, and you can deactivate or invite them again.
segment.target: Existing LOB publishers are listed on the page, and you can deactivate or invite them again.

segment.source: For more information, see Work with line-of-business apps.
segment.target: For more information, see Work with line-of-business apps.

segment.source: Management tools
segment.target: Management tools

segment.source: Management tools that are synced with Azure AD are listed on this page.
segment.target: Management tools that are synced with Azure AD are listed on this page.

segment.source: You can choose one to use for managing app updates and distribution.
segment.target: You can choose one to use for managing app updates and distribution.

segment.source: For more information, see Configure MDM provider.
segment.target: For more information, see Configure MDM provider.

segment.source: Permissions
segment.target: Permissions

segment.source: Manage permissions for your employees.
segment.target: Manage permissions for your employees.

segment.source: For more information, see Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business.
segment.target: For more information, see Roles and permissions in the Windows Store for Business.

segment.source: Private store
segment.target: Private store

segment.source: Update the name for your private store.
segment.target: Update the name for your private store.

segment.source: The new name will be displayed on a tab in the Store.
segment.target: The new name will be displayed on a tab in the Store.

segment.source: For more information, see Manage private store settings.
segment.target: For more information, see Manage private store settings.
